languages.text: ...тем, кто день за днем идет по одним и тем же коридорам в одни и те же отсеки, тем, кто рождается, взрослеет и умирает под гул корабельных машин, всегда хочется заглянуть хоть на миг в иную жизнь. И увидеть героев, что день за днем бьются за нас и за славу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ...тем, кто день за днем идет по одним и тем же коридорам в одни и те же отсеки, тем, кто рождается, взрослеет и умирает под гул корабельных машин — одним словом, нам, жителям средних палуб — всегда хочется заглянуть хоть на миг в иную жизнь. И увидеть героев, что день за днем бьются за нас и за славу Империума.

languages.text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.
languages.original_text: ...тем, кто день за днем идет по одним и тем же коридорам в одни и те же отсеки, тем, кто рождается, взрослеет и умирает под гул корабельных машин, всегда хочется заглянуть хоть на миг в иную жизнь. И увидеть героев, что день за днем бьются за нас и за славу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we, the denizens of the middle decks, forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the Imperium.

...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we, the denizens of the middle decks, forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the Imperium.

...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we, the denizens of the middle decks, forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the Imperium.

...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

languages.text: ... Quienes recorremos los mismos pasillos y bahías día tras día, quienes nacemos, vivimos y morimos acompañados del zumbido de la maquinaria de la nave, ansiamos siempre poder vislumbrar otra vida... y ver a los héroes que luchan incansablemente por nosotros y por la gloria del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.
languages.original_text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ... Quienes recorremos los mismos pasillos y bahías día tras día, quienes nacemos, vivimos y morimos acompañados del zumbido de la maquinaria de la nave, ansiamos siempre poder vislumbrar otra vida... y ver a los héroes que luchan incansablemente por nosotros y por la gloria del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

languages.text: ……我们日复一日，走在同样的船舱里，同样的通道上。我们在飞船机器的轰鸣声中出生、长大、死亡。我们始终渴望能看到另一种截然不同的生活……希望能亲眼看到那些英雄们，了解他们是如何为了我们、为了{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的荣耀不懈奋斗。
languages.original_text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ……我们日复一日，走在同样的船舱里，同样的通道上。我们在飞船机器的轰鸣声中出生、长大、死亡。我们始终渴望能看到另一种截然不同的生活……希望能亲眼看到那些英雄们，了解他们是如何为了我们、为了{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的荣耀不懈奋斗。

languages.text: …毎日同じベイの同じ道を行く我々、船の機械の騒音に生まれ、生き、そして死ぬ我々は、別の人生をほんの少し覗くことを永遠に求めている…そして私たちのために、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の栄光のために精力的に戦う英雄をこの目に映すチャンスを求めているのだ。
languages.original_text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

traits.locale_text: …毎日同じベイの同じ道を行く我々、船の機械の騒音に生まれ、生き、そして死ぬ我々は、別の人生をほんの少し覗くことを永遠に求めている…そして私たちのために、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の栄光のために精力的に戦う英雄をこの目に映すチャンスを求めているのだ。

languages.text: ... wir, die wir Tag für Tag durch dieselben Gänge in denselben Buchten gehen, wir, die wir zum Summen der Schiffstriebwerke geboren werden, leben und sterben, wir sehnen uns nach den kleinsten Einblicken in ein anderes Leben ... und nach einer Chance, die Helden und Heldinnen zu sehen, die unermüdlich für uns und den Ruhm des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} kämpfen.
languages.original_text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ... wir, die wir Tag für Tag durch dieselben Gänge in denselben Buchten gehen, wir, die wir zum Summen der Schiffstriebwerke geboren werden, leben und sterben, wir sehnen uns nach den kleinsten Einblicken in ein anderes Leben ... und nach einer Chance, die Helden und Heldinnen zu sehen, die unermüdlich für uns und den Ruhm des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} kämpfen.

languages.text: ... Nous qui parcourons jour après jour les mêmes couloirs des mêmes compartiments, nous qui naissons, vivons et mourons au son des machines du vaisseau, nous nourrissons une soif éternelle : avoir le plus infime aperçu d'une autre vie... et une chance d'entrevoir les héros qui se battent inlassablement pour nous et pour la gloire de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.
languages.original_text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ... Nous qui parcourons jour après jour les mêmes couloirs des mêmes compartiments, nous qui naissons, vivons et mourons au son des machines du vaisseau, nous nourrissons une soif éternelle : avoir le plus infime aperçu d'une autre vie... et une chance d'entrevoir les héros qui se battent inlassablement pour nous et pour la gloire de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

languages.text: ...Her gün aynı bölmelerin birbirinin aynısı geçitlerini arşınlayan bizler... Geminin makinelerinin aheste mırıltıları eşliğinde doğan, yaşayan ve ölümü karşılayan bizler... Başka bir hayatın yansımalarına duyduğumuz sonsuz özlem ve... Bizim için ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} şanı uğruna yılmadan savaşan kahramanları görmek için beslediğimiz bu açlık...
languages.original_text: ...we who walk down the same passageways in the same bays day after day, we who are born, live, and die to the hum of the ship's machines, we forever hunger for the smallest glimpse of another life... and for a chance to see the heroes who tirelessly fight for us and for the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}.

traits.locale_text: …Her gün aynı bölmelerin birbirinin aynısı geçitlerini arşınlayan bizler… Geminin makinelerinin aheste mırıltıları eşliğinde doğan, yaşayan ve ölümü karşılayan bizler… Başka bir hayatın yansımalarına duyduğumuz sonsuz özlem ve… Bizim için ve {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un şanı uğruna yılmadan savaşan kahramanları görmek için beslediğimiz bu açlık…
